body:
Hi djordje and Chris,
I have changed the component, I have added the possibility to connect locations directly. This can help you understand where the EPW locations are. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SrjgN2lOmuO-KIB2U2nq32qdIJDZoxaBCt6CPicKmEUA6w8Nvq*quwtLVrWpoGB3qVfCFp9t7CwQLWpQC3RmHQtLWdnumScG/new_inputmode2.png) or [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SrjgN2lOmuOFmvK-nucPWdk1K6*se1JpQyGxVlyBKqQSRfhbLex49zvYYdw16D9kjmFRj9qYcTyhuF1R79STUkexZmj0Tdtu/new_inputmode.png)
Furthermore, I have written a new small component, **Ladybug_Location Finder**. This component let you generate locations by typing the address of the location. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SrjgN2lOmuNuDB7*GSqPSCqbX45frVceCOK5rWmt11YYRfxr*ilgFK2Y1mO-RG*vIzlVQ9R2HUQguNvEWSeUTeNaxCuVgCcT/parthenon.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SrjgN2lOmuOa8iKzXnWyYiE72wRJfHGl4LjpTlQ*sSVaoXXPy-mRbK-U5hbDl9h6ezB8JK71fWtr3M01qbtCpuhZP0PYZfy8/campidoglio.png) Best Antonello
